all.description: After you play a card with 10 or more Power, this gains +3 Power.

all.name: Sunspot
all.description: After each turn, gain +1 Power for each unspent Energy.

all.name: Super-Skrull
all.description: Ongoing: Has the Ongoing effects of all enemy cards.

all.name: Supergiant
all.description: On Reveal: All cards played next turn don't reveal until the game ends.

all.name: Swarm
all.description:
When this is discarded from your hand, add two copies that Cost 0
to your hand.

all.name: Sword Master
all.description: On Reveal: Discard an odd-costed card from your hand.

all.name: Symbiote Spider-Man
all.description: Activate: Merge your lowest-Cost card here with this. Copy its text like it just revealed.

all.name: Taskmaster
all.description: On Reveal: Set this cardâ€™s Power equal to that of the last card you played. (if that card's in play)

all.name: Thanos
all.description: Starts in your opening hand and shuffles the six Infinity Stones into your deck.

all.name: The Collector
all.description: When a card enters your hand from anywhere (except your deck), +1 Power.

all.name: The Hood
all.description: On Reveal: Add a Demon to your hand.

all.name: The Infinaut
all.description: If you played a card last turn, you can't play this.

all.name: The Living Tribunal
all.description: Ongoing: Split your total Power evenly among all locations.

all.name: The Thing
all.description: It's clobberin' time!

all.name: Thena
all.description: After each turn, +3 Power if you played (exactly) 2 cards.

all.name: Thor
all.description: On Reveal: Shuffle Mjolnir into your deck.

all.name: Titania
all.description: After ANY card is played here, this card switches sides.

all.name: Toxin
all.description: On Reveal: Return your other cards here to your hand. +2 Power for each returned.

all.name: Typhoid Mary
all.description: Ongoing: Your other cards here have -1 Power.

all.name: U.S. Agent
all.description: Ongoing: 4, 5, and 6-Cost cards here have -4 Power.

all.name: Uatu the Watcher
all.description: At the start of the game, shows unrevealed locations to you.

all.name: Ultron
all.description: On Reveal: Create four 2-Power Drones at each other location.

all.name: Valentina
all.description: On Reveal: Add a random 6-Cost card to your hand. Give it -2 Cost and -3 Power.

all.name: Valkyrie
all.description: On Reveal: Set ALL cards at this location to 3 Power.

all.name: Venom
all.description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards at this location. Add their Power to this card.

all.name: Viper
all.description: On Reveal: One of your other cards here with the lowest Power switches sides.

all.name: Vision
all.description: You can move this each turn.

all.name: Vulture
all.description:
When this card moves,
+6 Power.

all.name: War Machine
all.description: Ongoing: Nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.

all.name: Warpath
all.description: Ongoing: If any of your locations are empty, +5 Power.

all.name: Wasp
all.description: My secret power is that I get things done.

all.name: Wave
all.description: On Reveal: All cards cost a maximum of 4 until the end of next turn.

all.name: Werewolf By Night
all.description: After you play an On Reveal card at another location, move there and gain +2 Power.

all.name: White Queen
all.description: On Reveal: Copy the card that costs the most from your opponent's hand into your hand.

all.name: White Tiger
all.description: On Reveal: Add a 8-Power Tiger to another location.

all.name: White Widow
all.description: On Reveal: Add a Widow's Kiss to your opponent's side of this location.

all.name: Wiccan
all.description: On Reveal: If you've spent all your Energy this game, +2 Max Energy.

all.name: Wolfsbane
all.description: On Reveal: +2 Power for each other card you have here.

all.name: Wolverine
all.description:
When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location
with +2 Power.

all.name: Wong
all.description: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities at this location happen twice.

all.name: X-23
all.description: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location and you get +1 Energy next turn.

all.name: Yellowjacket
all.description: On Reveal: Afflict your other cards at this location with -1 Power.

all.name: Yondu
all.description: On Reveal: Destroy the card that costs the least in your opponent's deck.

all.name: Zabu
all.description: On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, your 4-Cost cards cost 1 less.

all.name: Zero
all.description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities on the next card you play.
